title: Donate | Mekor Habracha
headings: How you can donate and help Mekor
text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor How you can donate and help Mekor The generosity of members and visitors who make donations to our shul are vital to help us continue serving our congregation as well as members of the wider Jewish community. Making a donation is a wonderful way to celebrate special occasions, honor your friends and family, or commemorate the yahrtzeit of your loved ones. Zelle: mekorhabracha@gmail.com Credit / ACH / Apple Pay PayPal Giving Fund Venmo ways you can donate Via Check Please send any checks to: Ellen Geller 3 Saint James Ct. Philadelphia, PA 19106 Sponsor/ Dedication Celebrate simchas with your Mekor community through Shabbat Kiddush sponsorships or honoring/memoralizing those impactful individuals in one's life through sponsorship opportunities! Kiddush Donation Page ONLINE Payment Donations may be made online (Venmo, PayPal Giving Fund, regular PayPal, Zelle, Credit, ACH or Apple Pay) Venmo PayPal Giving Fund Zelle: mekorhabracha@gmail.com Credit / ACH / Apple Pay donation opportunities All contributions are fully tax-deductible and will be acknowledged in a letter that may be used for tax purposes. Donations may be made online (Venmo, PayPal Giving Fund, regular PayPal, Zelle Credit, ACH or Apple Pay), or through our website by credit card (scroll down to the end of this page), or by sending a check payable to Mekor Habracha, c/o Ellen Geller, 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102. Please email the shul to let us know about your donation and any dedication you'd like to make. We offer a variety of donation opportunities: 1. Kiddush (Shabbat & Yom Tov) & Third Meal Sponsorship ($295/members $360/non-members) 2. Plaque on Memorial Board in shul Sanctuary ($1000)​ 3. Dedication of an Artscroll Siddur ($100), Machzor ($100), or Chumash ($200) 4. Community Dinner Sponsorship ($1800 full; $1000 half) 5. Talitot ($1000/set of 10; $150/one talit) 6. Mechitzot (2 available) $10,000 each 7. New Aron Kodesh $50,000 General contributions -- any amount is appreciated! Building spaces still available for dedication: Kitchen ($25,000); Library ($50,000); Synagogue Art Exhibit Hall ($20,000); 1 of 2 Children/ spaces ($25,000 each); Mekor Sanctuary & Event Space ($100,000)​ Make a Donation Mekor Habracha Center City Synagogue (215) 525-4246 admin@mekorhabracha.org ​ 1500 Walnut St Suite 206 Philadelphia, PA 19102 SUBSCRIBE TO OUR WEEKLY NEWSLETTER Enter your email here SUBSCRIBE Latest Newsletters Copyright ©2025 by Mekor Habracha Synagogue

    Support Mekor

    How you can donate and help Mekor

    The generosity of members and visitors who make donations to our shul are vital to help us continue serving our congregation as well as members of the wider Jewish community. Making a donation is a wonderful way to celebrate special occasions, honor your friends and family, or commemorate the yahrtzeit of your loved ones.

    Zelle: mekorhabracha@gmail.com

    Credit / ACH / Apple Pay

    PayPal Giving Fund
    Venmo

    ways you can donate

    Via Check

    Please send any checks to:

    Ellen Geller

    3 Saint James Ct.

    Philadelphia, PA 19106

    Sponsor/ Dedication

    Celebrate simchas with your Mekor community through Shabbat Kiddush sponsorships or honoring/memoralizing those impactful individuals in one's life through sponsorship opportunities!

    Kiddush Donation Page

    ONLINE Payment

    Donations may be made online (Venmo, PayPal Giving Fund, regular PayPal, Zelle, Credit, ACH or Apple Pay)

    Venmo
    PayPal Giving Fund

    Zelle: mekorhabracha@gmail.com

    Credit / ACH / Apple Pay

    donation opportunities

    All contributions are fully tax-deductible and will be acknowledged in a letter that may be used for tax purposes. Donations may be made online (Venmo, PayPal Giving Fund, regular PayPal, Zelle Credit, ACH or Apple Pay), or through our website by credit card (scroll down to the end of this page), or by sending a check payable to Mekor Habracha, c/o Ellen Geller, 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102. Please email the shul to let us know about your donation and any dedication you'd like to make.

    We offer a variety of donation opportunities:

    1. Kiddush (Shabbat & Yom Tov) & Third Meal Sponsorship ($295/members $360/non-members)

    2. Plaque on Memorial Board in shul Sanctuary ($1000)​

    3. Dedication of an Artscroll Siddur ($100), Machzor ($100), or Chumash ($200)

    4. Community Dinner Sponsorship ($1800 full; $1000 half)

    5. Talitot ($1000/set of 10; $150/one talit)

    6. Mechitzot (2 available) $10,000 each

    7. New Aron Kodesh $50,000

    General contributions -- any amount is appreciated!

    Building spaces still available for dedication: Kitchen ($25,000); Library ($50,000); Synagogue Art Exhibit Hall ($20,000); 1 of 2 Children/ spaces ($25,000 each); Mekor Sanctuary & Event Space ($100,000)​

    Make a Donation
    Mekor Habracha
    Center City Synagogue

    (215) 525-4246

    admin@mekorhabracha.org

    ​

    1500 Walnut St Suite 206

    Philadelphia, PA 19102
